title: Bug 17423 - Revert appears twice in the popup menu.
description: There are two Revert options in the menu.
OB: When the menu is opened, there are two instances of the Revert option visible.
EB: There should only be one Revert option visible, and it should be disabled.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Open the editor. 2) Perform an action that triggers the Revert option. 3) Make the editor dirty. 4) Open the menu.
